page.title: 07 St.Marys Church - Interior
page.content: Many of the stained glass windows in the church show scenes of the life of Jesus. The{lectern}is in the form of an eagle; it holds an open Bible so that everyone is welcome to read the word of God. There is now an{organ}in the church but before that there was an orchestra which played in a balcony above the arch into the bapistry. The vicar of the church has many vestments which are kept in the vestry. There are 4 special ones. A red one for Autumn, a green one for Spring, a purple one for up to Christmas and a white one for Summer. THere is also a 16th century oak chest which once contained the Parish Registers. This had two keys,one kept by the vicar and one by a churchwarden.
